board.docs:
**, string**: The PlatformIO board ID that should be used. Choose the appropriate board from [this list](https://registry.platformio.org/packages/platforms/kuba2k2/libretiny/boards) (the icon next to the name can be used to copy the board ID).**This affects CPU selection and some internal settings** - make sure to choose the right CPU. If unsure about the choice of a particular board, choose a generic board such as `generic-bk7231n-qfn32-tuya`.

*See also: [LibreTiny Platform](https://esphome.io/components/libretiny.html#configuration-variables)*

family.docs:
**, string**: The family of LibreTiny-supported microcontrollers that is used on this board. One of `bk7231n`, `bk7231t`, `rtl8710b`, `rtl8720c`, `bk7251`, `bk7231q`. Defaults to the variant that is detected from the board, if a board that’s unknown to ESPHome is used, this option is mandatory. **It’s recommended not to include this option**.

*See also: [LibreTiny Platform](https://esphome.io/components/libretiny.html#configuration-variables)*

framework.docs:
Options for the underlying framework used by ESPHome.
  * **version** (*Optional*, string): The LibreTiny version number to use, from [LibreTiny platform releases](https://github.com/kuba2k2/libretiny/releases). Defaults to `recommended`. Additional values
    * `dev`: Use the latest commit from [https://github.com/kuba2k2/libretiny](https://github.com/kuba2k2/libretiny), note this may break at any time
    
    * `latest`: Use the latest *release* from [https://github.com/kuba2k2/libretiny/releases](https://github.com/kuba2k2/libretiny/releases), even if it hasn’t been recommended yet.
    
    * `recommended`: Use the recommended framework version.
    
    
  
  * **source** (*Optional*, string): The PlatformIO package or repository to use for the framework. This can be used to use a custom or patched version of the framework.
  
  * [Advanced options](https://esphome.io/components/libretiny.html#advanced-options)
  
  

*See also: [LibreTiny Platform](https://esphome.io/components/libretiny.html#configuration-variables)*
